contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 3, 2001 D Whitburn Invitation Contest
Whitburn Invitation Contest 0 Entertainments Contest
whitburn-invitation-contest
None
St. Kentigern Academy, Blackburn, West Lothian 29th Whitburn Entertainment Contest Entertainment Judge - Jean Brownhill Section Winners 1st Section - Clackmannan District 2nd Section - Kirkintilloch Kelvin 3rd Section - Shotts St Patrick's 4th Section - Bon Accord Silver B Band. Most Entertaining Programme - Kirkintilloch. Best Solo Performance - K. Marzella, Broxburn Public. Best Cornet - Johnstone Silver Best Euphonium - Bo'ness & Carriden Best Instrumentalist - R. Tobin, Unison Kinneil. Best Trombone Section - Kirkintilloch Kelvin Best Bass Section - Unison Kinneil Best Percussion Section - Unison Kinneil.
Oct. 22, 2009, 12:12 p.m. Sept. 18, 2015, 8:01 a.m.
